scripts.build: lessc app/prefix.less app/bootstrap-iso.css && sed -i "s/.bootstrap-iso body/.bootstrap-iso/" app/bootstrap-iso.css && sed -i "s/.bootstrap-iso html/.bootstrap-iso/" app/bootstrap-iso.css && sed -i "s|../fonts/glyphicons|bower_components/bootstrap/dist/fonts/glyphicons|g" app/bootstrap-iso.css
